iana.template_text:
MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.amiga.ami

Required parameters : none    

Optional parameters : none    

Encoding considerations : 
The content of this media type is binary and requires suitable encoding.    

Security considerations : 
This media type may contain executable code which runs within the AmigaDE(tm). The AmigaDE is an operating environment running either natively on the target device's hardware, or hosted in the memory-protected application space of the supporting operating system. In either case, the device is exposed to the intentional and unintentional effects of running the executable code.

Interoperability considerations : 
This media type is a general purpose format for transferring AmigaDE content to Amiga enabled devices.    

Published specification : 
The file format is not an open specification. Amiga Incorporated controls the specification.    

Applications which use this media : 
AmigaDE system software. AmigaDE applications hosted on other platforms.    

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : none
2. File extension(s) : .ami
3. Macintosh file type code : none
4. Object Identifiers: none

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Kevin Blumberg
2. E-mail : kevin&amiga.com

Intended usage : Common 
This media type is a general purpose format for transferring AmigaDE content to Amiga enabled devices.    

Author/Change controller : Amiga, Incorporated
Address: 34935 SE Douglas Street, Suite 210
Snoqualmie, WA 98065         

(created 17 Jan 2002)
